sentences.sContent: I like peas more than cabbage .
sentences.sCn: 比起卷心菜我更喜欢豌豆。

sentences.sContent: We have fresh cabbage, celery, lettuce and spinach.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have fresh cabbage, celery, lettuce and spinach.
sentences.sCn: 有新鲜的卷心菜、芹菜、生菜和菠菜。

phrases.pCn: 大白菜泡菜；醋渍甘蓝菜

remMethod.val: cab(出租车) ＋ bag(包) ＋ e → 包辆出租车运输卷心菜 → 卷心菜

trans.tranOther: a large round vegetable with thick green or purple leaves
